course_title: Graduate Practicum in Nursing - GRAD PRAC NURS

sections.comments: Pre-requisite: NURS 540/ NURS 541This course is primarily a part of the MHLP program. MSN Students who have completed pre-requisites may be eligible to register with permission from the MHLP Pillar Director. Please email academic.support@nursing.ubc.ca for instructions on how to obtain permission.IF course is FULL please contact School of Nursing Student Support Office (academic.support@nursing.ubc.ca)This practicum-based course is designed to provide the student with an opportunity to explore advanced practice in the field of education through a selected educational setting of interest. Through the practicum experience the student is expected to engage reflexively to explore the relationship between nursing and education knowledge and educational practice in a specific teaching setting.
